you havent visited Online Account Services in the past month or so you may have missed some exciting changes For starters it has a great new look and is easier to navigate The only thing that hasnt changed is the convenience You can still access account informationincluding your balance payments and transactions hours a day days a week Its the best way to easily manage your account after holiday spending Log in to view statements up to six months old at any time The information you will access is as current and accurate as what you would receive by calling Capital One
